articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Mass shooting leaves 12 dead, including 3 children, in South Africa - NBC News
articles.description: A mass shooting carried out Saturday by multiple suspects in an unlicensed bar near the South African capital left at least 12 people dead, police said.
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa A mass shooting carried out Saturday by multiple suspects in an unlicensed bar near the South African capital left at least 12 people dead, police said. The victims included t… [+2373 chars]
